feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
